rows.THE SITE: PRODUCT SPEC: Password-protected. Consumer-grade quality. Direct response + VC investor dual audience. Daily video updates.
WHAT THIS IS
A password-protected website that serves as:
1. The public face of IonWave as the first DAO spinoff
2. The daily feedback loop (VA updates, milestones visible, anyone can check in 30 sec)
3. Proof for the infrastructure company (live case study, not a retrospective)
4. Recruiting tool (send password to potential hires, they see the cast and want in)
5. Investor pitch (send password to VCs, they see a company being built in real time)
It is NOT a startup dashboard. NOT a blog. NOT a project management tool.
It IS a consumer product. It should feel like Remedy Meds meets a Netflix docuseries.
Design reference: remedymeds.com — clean, authoritative, high-trust, cinematic imagery,
social proof, clear CTAs, FAQ objection handling. That quality bar, but for a company launch.
DUAL AUDIENCE DESIGN (Direct Response + VC)
DIRECT RESPONSE DNA (from Remedy):
• Authority badges: 'YC-backed founder' / 'Greylock-backed' / 'KV-backed' / '100M+ organic views'
• Social proof: Expert testimonials as they come on. Character count growing. Milestone counter.
• Clear CTA: 'Apply to join' / 'Request access' / 'Get the password' depending on audience
• Objection handling: FAQ section addressing 'is this real?' / 'what's the structure?' / 'what do I get?'
• Urgency / scarcity: 'Day 14 of 21' / 'X roles remaining' / live countdown to milestones
• Cinematic visuals: Not stock photos. Real video. Real people. Shot beautifully.
VC INVESTOR DNA:
• The thesis is visible: coordination hedgefund, thesis → order → fulfillment, complexity at launch
• The numbers are there: unit economics, market size, tech roadmap (P1/P2/P3)
• The system is demonstrated: 'this company was built using a 702-tab AI operating system'
• The team is credible: real backgrounds, real track record, real faces
• The ask is clear: what the infrastructure company is raising, for what, on what terms
These aren't separate sections. They're woven together.
The daily video update IS social proof AND investor proof AND the feedback loop.
The character page IS the team page AND the recruiting tool AND the org chart.
PASSWORD ARCHITECTURE
The password creates exclusivity and controls narrative timing.
Tier 1 password (inner circle): Nilo, CoS, active team. Full access. All updates.
Tier 2 password (recruits): Sent to potential hires. They see the cast, the story, the opportunity.
Tier 3 password (investors): Sent to VCs. They see everything Tier 2 sees + financials + thesis + ask.
Same site. Different depths. Password tier determines what sections are visible.
Or: single password, everyone sees everything. Radical transparency. Decide later.
The infrastructure needs to support both options.
